name: bilad al sham
startIntroPart2: you shall rule over the land of religions and cultures, and protect the peace and equality it held for years!
declaringWar: We wish peace, but you left us no choice...
defeated: I acknowledge that you have beaten us with honour, I respect that, may your rule be successful.
introduction: Alsalamu allaikom!, we are the people of great Damascus! Land of culture and religion!
hateHello: I prefer not talking with you...
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Finally peace rules the land again, like it should be!
tradeRequest: We have thought very deeply into this offer, what do you say?
